ModMetaData.name: Bagged Milk (Retexture)
ModMetaData.author: flo.vall, Shakesthespeare, TrahsPanda
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that retextures Core Milk, Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids insect milk, and VFME - Simple Tofu!'s soy milk.
Commissioned by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198849397375]flo.vall[/url]
Please put this mod after Core, VFEI, and Simple Tofu.
